p: Total tocopherols and tocotrienols content were measured by a Waters HPLC system equipped with a Waters 2487 ultraviolet detector set at an absorbance of 290 nm and a Luna Silica column (150 mm × 4.6 mm, 3 μm particle size) used at 35 °C. The test method was improved based on the method Boso et al. [ 35] used. The mobile phase consisted of 0.2% IPA (Isopropanol) and 0.8% acetic acid in n-hexane flowing at 1.0 mL/min. Extracted oil samples (1 g) were diluted with 10 mL n-hexane and injected into the HPLC system.
